data.description: Tk composite widget for timer display
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I am revisiting a timer application I have written, see

    http://perlmonks.org/index.pl?node_id=210207

    A spinoff from the rewrite will be the module Tk::Timer. In the
    processes of my researches, I have come across Tk::Clock.pm, whose
    analog display functionality I quite like.

    However, Clock.pm only gives you the current system time. I have
    contacted the author of this module (H Merijn Brand) to see if there
    are any enhancements in the pipeline.

    Even if Clock.pm is enhanced (either by Merijn or myself), there is
    still a need for a separate Timer.pm composite widget to provide a
    button, extra configuration, and functionality of the timer.
